about_the_game:
You are the last living panda protecting the land of Latobius, next to your king. Hastily appointed the one and only Knight, you must make sure nothing disturbs his royal slumber.

KEY FEATURES
  • Build a fortress from a library of upgradable structures during the day.
  • Use a variety of unique weapons to smash, slash, and bash your way through endless rounds of Night Panda menace- until sunrise gives you a break.
  • Sprint, slide, and bunny hop and you'll never get caught.
  • Trade with merchants, hire muscle, and craft your way to safety using the souls of the enemies destroyed.

It's all about balance. Can you craft the perfect Knightly Routine?

What people say about Knightly Routine

  • "A fast-paced, exciting game full of magic and wonder" - My Mom
  • "Uhh... yeah, I said it was great." - My Mom
  • "How many more of these do you want me to do?" - My Mom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or AMD Ryzen 3 2300U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Knightly Routine is a wave-based fantasy survival game. Build castles, craft weapons, and trade with merchants during the day to protect yourself and your king from the endlessly growing waves of Night Pandas- because they really don't like you.
